sentences.en: Add Oreo crumb and wheat germ and blend well.
sentences.cn: 搅奥利奥饼和小麦胚芽进芝士内.

sentences.en: After the meal, the waiter brushed the crumb from the table.
sentences.cn: 饭后, 服务员把面包屑从桌子上扫了下去.

sentences.en: At last Andrew gave them a crumb of information.
sentences.cn: 最后，安德鲁向他们透露了一点信息。

sentences.en: Coarse crumb rubber is apt to deposit in asphalt.
sentences.cn: 粗的橡胶颗粒容易在沥青中沉淀.

sentences.en: Coat with bread crumbs and bake.
Crumb is mainly used for fried beefsteak and chicken as frying dressing.
sentences.cn: “面包糠”是广泛使用的食品添加辅料,主要用于西餐炸牛排、炸鸡腿等油炸辅料.

sentences.en: Crumb the chicken strips and then fry in a pan of oil.
sentences.cn: 在鸡肉条上裹上面包屑,然后在油锅里炸.

sentences.en: Girl bate: Talk nonsense again, I with respect to crumb your egg!
sentences.cn: 少女大怒: 再胡扯, 我就捏碎你的蛋!

sentences.en: Micky is a crumb , and he treats me like dirt.
sentences.cn: 米基真令人讨厌,他把我当无赖对待.

sentences.en: Microfloral activity in worm may have an important effect on soil crumb structure.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓类中微生物群落活性对土壤团粒结构可起重要作用.

sentences.en: Ruth nearly choked on the last crumb of her pastry.
sentences.cn: 鲁斯几乎被糕点的最后一块碎屑所噎住.

sentences.en: She flicked a crumb off the corner of her mouth.
She stood up to brush the crumbs off her uniform.
sentences.cn: 她站起来拂去制服上的面包屑。

sentences.en: Studies showed that crumb rubber powder could improve the roadperformance of asphalt.
sentences.cn: 而已有的研究表明废胶粉能改善沥青的路用性能.

sentences.en: This will be only a crumb of comfort to Juyuan's grieving parents.
sentences.cn: 这将是对于聚源处于悲痛中的家长们唯一的意思慰藉.

sentences.en: Yet , never , in extremity, It asked a crumb of me.
sentences.cn: 哪怕它自己身处绝境, 也从不向我索取一丝半点.

phrases.tran_cn: 面包心；面包碎屑；面包瓤

phrases.phrase: crumbs from someone's( 或 a rich man's)table
phrases.tran_cn: （富人）桌上的碎屑；不公平（或不满意）的所得

trans.tran_cn: 碎屑（尤指面包屑或糕饼屑），面包心，些许，少许，<俚>可鄙的人物
trans.tran_en: a very small piece of dry food, especially bread or cake
